TopicTitle: Episode Ten: Stranded Squared | It's Hardly Rocket Science | Kerbal Comics

Articles.Content:
Our latest episode is up!

http://www.kerbalcomics.com/2012/06/22/episode-ten-stranded-squared/

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

Kerbal Comics
Truely, Kerbal engineering at it\'s best. I lol\'d because this is like a lot of my missions.
That\'s happen to me so many times ;D . Another good one Capt\'n Skunky :thumbup:

he he great job

Keep em coming..

love it!

I\'ve lost count of the number of times I\'ve also done that in KSP...

Joe 8)
Spot on, this is exactly how my rescue missions will unfold. We might need a mod to put a grandstand/bleachers on the mun. These are terrific comics.
Am I intended to think that it\'s silly that they crashed? They landed within 20 feet of each other! I\'m envious of the piloting! ;D

Maybe they should build a Munbase with the components.

Or use a lander leg from the first vehicle to fix the second vehicle, stand it up [cause low gravity is cool like that], and then fly home.
Awesome! but too awesome I woke up my parents
You now need a third craft to smack into those six, wiping out all nine ... That would be kerbal!
I was not much of a fan of these (to each their own) but this is the best one yet, since many of us can relate to it, and thank you for referring to them as kerbOnauts in the cartoon.

Maybe they should build a Munbase with the components.

Or use a lander leg from the first vehicle to fix the second vehicle, stand it up [cause low gravity is cool like that], and then fly home.

Maybe somebody forgot to pack the duct tape? They screwed.
'So.....anybody bring a deck of cards?'
That would be a perfect 'mouseover' punchline (a la xkcd)
This episode simply nail it: the landing gear, as tough as they are on the numbers, still snapping off the rocket body =P
Lol, this has actually happened to me. Great job.

Maybe they should build a Munbase with the components.

Or use a lander leg from the first vehicle to fix the second vehicle, stand it up [cause low gravity is cool like that], and then fly home.

Just put the landing gear up and stand it up on the engine!

By the way, the update was on friday.

New update schedule, or backlog cleaning ASAP?

Loved this one! (same with all the others, really)

These comics are great

Always make me laugh.

By the way, the update was on friday.

New update schedule, or backlog cleaning ASAP?

Since we had gotten a little behind, I went and released it early (or late if you will). The next episode is scheduled for July 2nd, a week from tomorrow.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

Kerbal Comics
Looking at all these comics makes me think that KSP would lend itself really well to a cel shaded art style.
haha, love these comics xD
Hey, I didn\'t know about these! Love them!
At least Mun is only a three hour journey away...

At least Mun is only a three hour journey away...

A three hour tour.

A three hour tour.
